seamless_loading_screen.config.title: Seamless Loading Screen Options
seamless_loading_screen.config.display.d: Options relating to how screenshots are rendered during the loading screen.
seamless_loading_screen.config.capturing: Options relating to how screenshots are captured.
seamless_loading_screen.config.time.desc: The amount of time, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second), that the fade-in effect should wait before starting to fade to allow chunks to load in.
seamless_loading_screen.config.fade.desc: The amount of time, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second), that the fade-in effect should take.
seamless_loading_screen.config.disableCa: Should camera movement be disabled whilst the fade-in effect is taking place?
seamless_loading_screen.config.archiveSc: Should old screenshots be archived for later use?
seamless_loading_screen.config.updateWor: Should the world icon be updated when you leave a singleplayer world?
seamless_loading_screen.config.soundEffe: The identifier of the sound effect to be played when the fade-in process begins.
seamless_loading_screen.config.playSound: Should a sound effect be played once the fade-in process begins?
seamless_loading_screen.config.screensho: How strong should the blur effect be? A higher strength means the screenshot will be less recognizable.
What level of quality should the blur be? A lower quality causes more recognizable blur patterns but is more peformance friendly.
seamless_loading_screen.config.tintColor: What color should the screenshot be tinted?
seamless_loading_screen.config.tintStren: How strong should the tint effect be?
seamless_loading_screen.config.resolutio:
Native - Optifine TAA compatibility, game's resolution
Normal - Supports up to 21:9 ultrawide monitors
4K - For 4K monitors
8K - For 8K monitors
seamless_loading_screen.config.serverDis: Changes the default mode selected for whether or not to display a Screenshot
seamless_loading_screen.config.blacklist: List of server addresses that Seamless Loading Screen will disable itself for when connecting to the config.
seamless_loading_screen.config.saveScree: Will attempt to use the username (if valid) to save the screenshots to prevent multi-user issues
